_header: Sith wisemen that before our daws
Title(s): ‘The Foly of Fulys and the Thewis of Wysmen’
Subjects: wise men, qualities of; fools, qualities of
_description: ‘The Foly of Fulys and the Thewis of Wysmen’ — 480 lines in couplets

CULKk15.First Lines:
Sen vysmen that be fore our dawisStudyt in prophesy and in
                    lawis…
CULKk15.Last Lines:
…Quhay lovis honor suld thaim vmbeschewBe war and wys and kep
                    ȝow now
CULKk15.Attributed Title:
Explicit the foly of fulys and the thewis of wysmen And syne here
                        efter… (f. 42v)
CULKk15.Editions:
Lumby,  Joseph Rawson,
                        ed.  
             Ratis Raving, and other Moral and Religious Pieces in prose and
                verse.

Girvan,  Ritchie,

Scottish Text Society 3rd ser.
         11. Edinburgh and London: Blackwood, 1939: 52-65.
